title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 83.3 - Antidiscrimination
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 83.3 - Antidiscrimination

State Regulations
(a) It is the
policy of the department that the department and its officers, employees and
agents shall not discriminate against any individual by virtue of his or her
being identified as, or suspected of, having AIDS, HIV infection, or HIV
related illness. (b) The department
will take appropriate steps to make its officers, employees and agents aware of
the department's policy as set forth in this section. All officers, employees
and agents of the department shall act in a manner consistent with this policy
when performing their official duties for the department. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4
ยง
83.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
